labels.name: feature
labels.value: Manage pets in the Swagger Petstore API

labels.name: story
labels.value: The user successfully adds a pet with a valid ID 1

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Manage pets in the Swagger Petstore API

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: The user successfully adds a pet with a valid ID 1

labels.name: package
labels.value: src.test.java.features.integration.sprint1.HU_AddOrUpdateAPetToTheStore_feature.Manage pets in the Swagger Petstore API

name: The user successfully adds a pet with a valid ID 1
description:
As a user of the Swagger Petstore API
  I want to manage pets in the store
  So that I can perform CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on pets

steps.name: Given  the user has access to the Swagger Petstore API
When  the user makes a POST request to "pet" with valid pet data, including the name "Lucky", status "placed" and ID "1"
Then  the response should have a status code of 200
Then  the response body should contain the ID of the new pet
